comments.comment:
chorus (last)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

properties.copyright: 1974, 1978 New Jerusalem Music, Administered by New Jerusalem Music
properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c2

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A
How lovely on the mountains
Are the feet of Him
Who brings good news good news

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Announcing peace
Proclaiming news of happiness
Our God reigns our God reigns

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Our God reigns our God reigns
Our God reigns our God reigns

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He had no stately form
He had no majesty
That we should be drawn to Him

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He was despised
And we took no account of Him
Yet now He reigns with the Most High

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
It was our sin and guilt
That bruised and wounded Him
It was our sin that brought Him down

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
When we like sheep had gone astray
Our Shepherd came
And on His shoulders bore our shame

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Meek as a lamb
That's led out to the slaughterhouse
Dumb as a sheep before its shearer

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
His life ran down
Upon the ground like pouring rain
That we might be born again

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Out of the tomb
He came with grace and majesty
He is alive He is alive

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
God loves us so see here
His hands His feet His side
Yes we know He is alive

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
He's alive, He's alive
He's alive, He's alive
Our God reigns our God reigns
Our God reigns our God reigns
